subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The United States Open champion Ángel Cabrera beat the defending champion Paul Casey, 4 and 3, in the second round of the World Match Play Championship in Virginia Water, England. The six-time champion Ernie Els beat Andres Romero, 6 and 5, and Henrik Stenson and Hunter Mahan also advanced. Stenson, the Accenture Match Play Championship winner in February, beat Anders Hansen, 7 and 6, and Mahan topped Soren Hansen, 6 and 4. Cabrera will play Mahan, and Els will face Stenson in today’s semifinals.
